data.title: Close B Site + Market Execute Haunt
data.description: Throw this Haunt to scan Defenders playing close to B Main and Market. This is great to pressure any Market player successfully, or set up for a B Split.

data.title: Tiles Haunt to Close Mid + Cat
data.description: Here's a great, default Haunt you can throw at the start of the round to scan aggressive Defenders at Cat and Mid.

data.title: A Main to A Switch Seize Execute
data.description: Prevent Defenders from disrupting your A Site execute with this seize, as it stops them from retaking through the smoked door.

data.title: A Switch Haunt For A Site And Tree
data.description: Split the A Site with this powerful Haunt line up, as it will scan Defenders playing in Tree and close site.
